channel.title: concurrency on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in concurrency on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Parallelism in JavaScript
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Most of applications nowadays are created with the aim to be on the web. JavaScript has become a mainstream programming language to support the direction.

item.title: Go Concurrency
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Golang concurrency When we talk about Golang, its most basic and popular characteristic is concurrency-support. Unlike other languages what is quite complex to build an concurrency system, Go concurrency primitives via Goroutines and channels make concurrent programming easy.
